column4: is there a way to directly control  a linux box aside from going through ssh?  i do not have a working keyboard on the box itself but need to use the display its connect to
but will vnc work on console level?  xterm isnt working due to ati driver issues
you can start a screen session on the display
screen is like a multi-workspace cli...you get normal cli and ctrl+a to start a new term... man screen for more
